#comment: The following are CMOR internal settings and should not be edited by the user
_history_template: %s; CMOR rewrote data to be consistent with <activity_id>, and <Conventions> standards
references: Xie, P., R. Joyce, S. Wu, S.-H. Yoo, Y. Yarosh, F. Sun, and R. Lin, 2017: Reprocessed, bias-corrected CMORPH global high-resolution precipitation estimates. J.  Hydrometeor., 18, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.1175/JHM-D-16-0168.1
title: CMORPH V1.0 daily data NOAA Climate Data Record (CDR) of CPC Morphing Technique (CMORPH) High Resolution Global Precipitation Estimates, Version 1
